statements: SELECT * FROM patient_satisfaction_survey;
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_satisfaction_survey;
SELECT * FROM patient_satisfaction_survey WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT patient_id, comments FROM patient_satisfaction_survey ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_satisfaction_survey WHERE comments IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_satisfaction_survey WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_satisfaction_survey WHERE patient_id < 100 AND satisfaction_score BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_satisfaction_survey WHERE satisfaction_score = 5 AND comments LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC, satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT patient_id, count(*) AS total_submissions FROM patient_satisfaction_survey GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_submissions >= 3 ORDER BY total_submissions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM patient_satisfaction_survey WHERE satisfaction_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_surveys WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM patient_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_services WHERE service_name LIKE 'Surgery%';
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_rating FROM healthcare_services WHERE service_type = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_services ORDER BY service_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_surveys WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM patient_surveys WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM patient_surveys;
SELECT ps.survey_id, hs.service_name, hs.service_type FROM patient_surveys ps JOIN healthcare_services hs ON ps.satisfaction_score = hs.service_rating;

SELECT ps.satisfaction_score, hs.service_rating FROM patient_surveys ps LEFT JOIN healthcare_services hs ON ps.satisfaction_score = hs.service_rating WHERE hs.service_rating IS NULL ORDER BY ps.satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_data WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_rating FROM healthcare_services WHERE service_rating > 4.5;
SELECT response_id, survey_date, satisfaction_rating FROM survey_responses ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC, survey_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_age ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 30 AND patient_gender = 'Female';

SELECT pd.patient_name, hs.service_name, sr.feedback FROM patient_data pd JOIN survey_responses sr ON sr.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN healthcare_services hs ON sr.service_id = hs.service_id WHERE sr.satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY sr.satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(patient_age) AS avg_age, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_data GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_score, MIN(satisfaction_score) AS min_score, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM patient_data;
SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT staff_name, staff_department FROM medical_staff WHERE staff_role='Doctor' AND staff_department='Cardiology';
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_rating FROM healthcare_services ORDER BY service_rating DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT staff_name, staff_role, staff_department FROM medical_staff ORDER BY staff_role;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_rating FROM healthcare_services WHERE service_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_staff.staff_name, healthcare_services.service_name FROM patients JOIN survey_responses ON patients.patient_id = survey_responses.patient_id JOIN medical_staff ON survey_responses.staff_id = medical_staff.staff_id JOIN healthcare_services ON survey_responses.service_id = healthcare_services.service_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponse ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT name, location, service_type FROM HealthcareProvider WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT question_text FROM Question WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT Patient.name, Patient.age, SurveyResponse.question_id, SurveyResponse.answer FROM Patient JOIN SurveyResponse ON Patient.patient_id = SurveyResponse.patient_id WHERE SurveyResponse.response_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY SurveyResponse.response_date ASC

SELECT Patient.name, Patient.gender, HealthcareProvider.name AS provider_name, HealthcareProvider.location FROM Patient JOIN HealthcareProvider ON Patient.name = HealthcareProvider.service_type WHERE HealthcareProvider.rating > 4

SELECT Patient.name, SurveyResponse.answer FROM Patient JOIN SurveyResponse ON Patient.patient_id = SurveyResponse.patient_id WHERE SurveyResponse.answer LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY SurveyResponse.response_date DESC
SELECT Patient.name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM Patient JOIN SurveyResponse ON Patient.patient_id = SurveyResponse.patient_id GROUP BY Patient.name HAVING total_responses > 2
